name: Frog Token Worlds
description:
Controls:

  • A/D: Left and Right
  • S: Quick fall down
  • Space: Jump
  • Left Click: Attack

Objective:

Collect tokens, both XP and Frog tokens, while defending yourself from increasing amounts of enemies as you progress! Don't worry, the more enemies there are... the better weapons you are capable of equipping! Each time you collect a frog token, your weapon is changed at random, every 5 tokens you unlock a new weapon until you unlock the final weapon! The onslaught of enemies gets increasingly difficult as you go, so gaining EXP and skill points is almost necessary to continue on through further parts of the game.

Frog Token Worlds is a game that originated as a pixel 2D arcade-shooter RPG that has just now entered the 3D realm. Soon to have controller support!

Try out Frog Token Worlds 2D (Demo) version HERE 

https://frogtokenworlds.itch.io/frog-token-worlds-2d
